title: Strictly’s Katya Jones plunges to the floor in tears after Mike Bushell dance
text:
Katya Jones was very emotional after her dance (Picture: BBC)

Katya Jones was left in tears following her dance with Mike Bushell on Strictly Come Dancing.

The 30-year-old Strictly professional dancer dropped to the floor twice on last week’s show, but she hit the deck for an entirely different reason on the latest live show.

After dancing the Quickstep with partner Mike Bushell to Dexy’s Midnight Runners track Come On Eileen, Katya dropped to the floor in tears after a particularly tough week of training.

Asked if the dance felt good by host Tess Daly, Mike said: ‘Yes because of the struggles, the flu, the cold this week. Thursday afternoon I never thought we’d get around like that.

‘It was such fun. Great song, I grew up to it.’

Katya was in tears throughout the judges critiques, and even afterwards with host Claudia Winkleman.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I’m so proud of him,’ Katya said.

‘I’ve never seen you like this before,’ Claudia remarked.

Katya Jones said she wanted to kiss Mike (Picture: BBC)

Mike was happy when Craig gave him a seven! But his face when he gets a nine from Motsi is the definition of OMG! Be proud @mikebreakfast and @mrs_katjones! #Strictly pic.twitter.com/m6GNPTYePO — BBC Strictly ✨ (@bbcstrictly) October 12, 2019

The dance proved their best yet, scoring seven, nine, eight, and eight with the judges for a total score of 32.

‘I want to kiss him so much. I love him so much. He worked so hard,’ Katya said.

Strictly Come Dancing continues Sunday on BBC One.

MORE: Strictly’s Kelvin Fletcher branded ‘filth’ by Craig Revel Horwood as judges lose their minds over Rumba

MORE: Strictly’s Dianne Buswell poses with red-haired fan after It Takes Two appearance
description: Katya Jones dropped to the floor for an entirely different reason on this week's Strictly Come Dancing.
